task.title: Install the JDK Software
task.shortdesc: Open Search Server (OSS) requires a Java™ runtime environment (JRE) version 5 or newer.

step.cmd: Download the JDK software from Sun Microsystems or IBM.

choices.choice: Sun Microsystems provides JRE (or JDK) for Windows™ , Linux and Solaris™ operating systems: Sun download page .
IBM® provides JRE for AIX™, and Linux operating systems: IBM developer kit

step.cmd: Select the appropriate JRE/JDK version for your operating system and download.
Install the JRE/JDK using the installation instructions.
